definitions.definition: Synonym of leprosy in its various senses .
The supposed impurity or impurities of various metals , understood as causing their deviation from gold .
examples: The purpose of physical alchemy —as opposed to its various spiritual pursuits—was to treat the leprosity of base metals such as lead , refining and purifying them into gold .

main_definition: ( medicine , now rare ) Synonym of leprosy in its various senses .
secondary_definitions: ( alchemy , of metals ) The supposed impurity or impurities of various metals , understood as causing their deviation from gold .
( biology , of plants , now rare ) Synonym of scaliness .
